1370: Wigboldo was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 9.
Cats took care of Wigboldo since Wigboldo was 10.
1380: Lost father at the age of 10.
Left Nieu straet.B.1 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 11.
1387: Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1388: Got married to Saxiardis at age 19 in 1388.
Had Saxiardis move in at Potstraet.A.2 after marriage.
1389: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Saxiardis, at age 19.
1391: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Waldrada, at age 21.
1392: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 4 years old.
1394: Had a daughter with Saxiardis, Walburgis, at age 24.
1396: Lost his wife Saxiardis while she was giving birth to Erkenradis in 1396.
1398: Got married a second time to Breghlent at age 29 in 1398.
Had Breghlent move in at Potstraet.A.2 after marriage.
1399: Had a daughter with Breghlent, Hille, at age 29.
